objects.specification: A light gray floor made of durable material with a smooth, slightly textured surface, creating a neutral, welcoming base for the classroom.
A smooth cream-colored wall constructed with standard building materials, featuring a soft finish and no decorative elements.
A smooth cream-colored wall constructed with standard building materials, featuring a soft finish and no decorative elements.
A smooth cream-colored wall constructed with standard building materials, featuring a soft finish and no decorative elements.
A smooth cream-colored wall constructed with standard building materials, featuring a soft finish and no decorative elements.
A large rectangular teacher's desk crafted from dark wood with a spacious flat top, rounded corners, and sturdy legs. The finish is a rich, darker wood tone for a professional aesthetic.
A comfortable teacher chair with a dark wood frame and a supportive high back upholstered in muted blue fabric. It features ergonomic contours and a polished finish.
A large rectangular blackboard with a dark matte writing surface framed by a thin wooden border. Designed for chalk or whiteboard markers.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a white housing and smooth contours, designed for crisp image projection onto the blackboard.
A tall wooden bookshelf made of light wood, featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with books. It has a simple, functional design with an open back structure.
A tall wooden bookshelf made of light wood, featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with books. It has a simple, functional design with an open back structure.
A circular analog clock with a white face, black Arabic numerals, and slender black hands, housed in a simple frame.
A potted plant with lush green leaves placed in a simple ceramic pot to bring a natural element to the interior.
A rectangular recessed ceiling light with diffused cover, providing bright and uniform illumination across the room.
A rectangular recessed ceiling light with diffused cover, providing bright and uniform illumination across the room.

An educational poster printed on matte paper with vibrant colors and clear graphics, mounted flat on the wall.

A small cylindrical waste bin made of gray plastic with a smooth finish.

A large rectangular window with clear glass panes set in a light frame, allowing natural light into the room. It has operable sashes for ventilation.
A simple fabric curtain panel in soft cream color, hanging smoothly with gentle folds and a light texture.
A simple fabric curtain panel in soft cream color, hanging smoothly with gentle folds and a light texture.
A simple rectangular student desk crafted from light wood with a smooth tabletop, rounded edges, and four straight legs. The finish is a warm light wood tone for a bright and welcoming appearance.
A student chair featuring a light wood frame and four legs supporting a seat and backrest upholstered in a muted blue fabric. The design is functional and ergonomic for student use.
